concept.title: Console
concept.shortdesc: The provides a console to configure pipelines, preview data, monitor pipelines, and review snapshots of data.

conbody.p: Data Collector consoleoverviewThe console includes the following general areas and icons:

strow.stentry: Pipeline canvas
Canvas for configuring or monitoring a pipeline.
Properties panel / Preview panel / Monitor panel

When you configure a pipeline, the Properties panel displays the properties of the pipeline or selected stage. You can resize, minimize and maximize the panel.
When you preview data, the Preview panel displays the input and output data for the selected stage or group of stages.
When you monitor a running pipeline, the Monitor panel displays real-time metrics and statistics.
Pipeline library
Library of pipelines associated with this .
Home icon
Displays a home page with a list of pipelines and their statuses.
Notifications icon
Displays notifications.
Administration icon
Provides access to configuration properties, directories, and log. Also allows you to shut down the .
User icon
Displays the active user and the roles assigned to the user. Also allows you to log out of the console.
Help icon
Provides access to the online help, the REST API, and the version. Also allows you to define display settings and the online help version to use.
Toggle Library Pane icon
Icon to show or hide the pipeline library.
Actions icon
Allows you to import, export, duplicate, or delete a pipeline.

conbody.p: For information about pipeline configuration options, see .
For information about data preview options, see .
For information about pipeline monitoring options, see .
